name: Life is about balance
description:
Congratulations!
You just got hired by the company that makes those crappy motivational posters with lots of different fonts and a picture of a tree. Now just think up some clichés, draw some crappy trees and make enough money to pay this week's rent. Pro tip: Better posters will get you more money, but take more time to make.

Controls

Everything's done using the "z" and "x" keys. The menus are self-explanatory, in the levels you can tap "z" to attack to the left and tap "x" to attack to the right. Pressing both at the same time will perform a dodge, holding a key might make you move in that direction.

Jam
This game is part of the Mini Jam 34. It was made in about two days, so a lot of stuff was not implemented. The core gameplay is still pretty solid. That jam is also where the terrible two-button control scheme came from.
